app_descript:
Brief: Check In Qld is a practical and user-friendly application designed to streamline the process of venue check-in throughout Queensland, Australia. As of November 19, 2021, users can conveniently add their COVID-19 digital certificate to their profile, enhancing their ability to verify their vaccination status, particularly as certain locations begin to mandate full vaccination for entry.

  • â° Check-in Reminders: Timely reminders for incomplete check-ins to ensure adherence to venue policies. ğŸ“Œ
  • ğŸ”’ Secure Data Handling: Attendance information is securely retained for a period of 56 days for contact tracing before deletion. ğŸ“Œ
